aws_iam_openid_connect_provider.description: Provides an IAM OpenID Connect provider.

url.description: The URL of the identity provider. Corresponds to the _iss_ claim.

client_id_list.description: A list of client IDs (also known as audiences). When a mobile or web app registers with an OpenID Connect provider, they establish a value that identifies the application. (This is the value that's sent as the client_id parameter on OAuth requests.)

thumbprint_list.description: A list of server certificate thumbprints for the OpenID Connect (OIDC

arn.description: The ARN assigned by AWS for this provider.
